title: ohevan.com
description: My personal blog. I write about programming, notes, reviews for techs and more. Built with hexo blog framework, hosted on Vercel, using my own theme, "hexo-theme-redefine".

body.raw: Built with [Hexo](https://hexo.io/) blog framework, hosted on [Vercel](https://vercel.com/). Theme: [hexo-theme-redefine](https://github.com/EvanNotFound/hexo-theme-redefine)
